title: Cash prizes for winners of HUTCH Danumai Miliyanayai
body_lines: HUTCH, the country’s fast-growing choice for mobile communication services, announced the winners of the 27th season of HUTCH Danumai Miliyanayai, a general knowledge quiz competition to improve knowledge. This season’s winners were awarded a Million Rupees worth of cash prizes at an event held at the HUTCH Head Office in Colombo.
The first prize was awarded to K. L. S. Kumara from Athurugiriya, the second prize to A. A. M. C. Premalal from Seeduwa, and the third prize was awarded to G. H. S. A. Shantha from Buttala.

HUTCH Danumai Miliyanayai is organized by HUTCH together with Beyond M, a leading supplier of software products and services and a subsidiary of hSenid Software International, acting as the service provider for the platform on which the quiz is hosted. Users can participate for this six-month-long competition via SMS, web or by downloading the app Danumai Miliyanayai.
